subject: Update tsconfig.eslint.json across all stacks
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Add `"module": "preserve"` and `"moduleResolution": "bundler"` to all 5 tsconfig.eslint.json files (typescript, cdk, nestjs, expo stacks + Lisa root). This enables extensionless imports during ESLint type-checking. For CDK, change existing `"NodeNext"` values; for others, add the settings explicitly to override inherited NodeNext.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] `typescript/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.eslint.json` has module: preserve and moduleResolution: bundler
- [ ] `cdk/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.eslint.json` has module: preserve and moduleResolution: bundler (changed from NodeNext)
- [ ] `nestjs/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.eslint.json` has module: preserve and moduleResolution: bundler
- [ ] `expo/copy-overwrite/tsconfig.eslint.json` has module: preserve and moduleResolution: bundler
- [ ] `tsconfig.eslint.json` (root) has module: preserve and moduleResolution: bundler

**Skills to Invoke:** `/coding-philosophy`

**Verification:**
- type: manual-check
- command: `bun run typecheck`
- expected: passes with 0 errors
